tipiaction.name: setTheme
tipiaction.description: Deprecated, used to set Substance 4.3 themes. Use setSkin to utilize skins

tipiaction.name: setSkin
tipiaction.description: Sets the skin of the Substance look and feel. If the current L&F is not substance, it will switch to it.

tipiaction.name: loadSkins
tipiaction.description: Injects a navajo object listing all available skins in a selection property
